```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```



## Import packages
```{r import packages, warning=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(knitr)
library(rmarkdown)
library(synthpop)
```


## Load dataset
```{r load temp.csv, warning=FALSE}
df <- read_csv("temp.csv")

# Show first 5 rows
kable(head(df))
```

## Head of dataset

```{r head dataset, layout="l-body-outset",  warning=FALSE}
paged_table(df)
```

## Snynthpop

``` {r synthpop, layout="l-body-outset",  warning=FALSE}
mysyn <- syn(df)
summary(mysyn)
compare(mysyn, df)
```
